page.title: 25Clubs & Sports
page.content:
Clubs and Sports

1st Harbury Guides delivered a questionnaire about involvement with sports and clubs to 200 homes in the village.

60% of those who returned the survey sheets played a sport. These included bowls, rugby, table tennis, swimming, walking, horse-riding, tennis, basket ball, cricket and badminton.

Harbury is well-endowed with clubs and societies it is felt. Those surveyed mentioned membership of the Harbury Society, Book Club, Theatre Group, Twinning Association, Bible Study Group, Wednesday Walkers, Mothers' Union, Women's Institute, Harbury Friends, Tai Chi, Harbury Energy Initiative and the Village Club.


1st Harbury Guides
